name: Minimalist Couchtuner
description: This style makes the video larger without having to go fullscreen with the player.  At the same time, this style removes the TV shows list, side ads, banner ads, and header logo.  It leaves the video links to make sure you can access the correct version for your viewing pleasure.

user.name: closs_the_man
user.about: Part time web-dev, full-time super hero (business analyst).

additional_info: Added -webkit fill available to the iframe.
